amendment.description: Amendment adds human smuggling and human trafficking to the list of specified unlawful activity under the Federal money laundering statute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 109-350 to add human trafficking and human smuggling to the list of predicate acts under the federal money laundering statute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
